title: FS; T3 Turkey Red Addie Joss Sgc20

posts.post_title: FS; T3 Turkey Red Addie Joss Sgc20
posts.post_content:
Nice card w/ eye appeal, punished due to a small thumb tack hole in it's gray top border. Probably grades a (3) without it. 

Just upgraded this one with a higher graded example from LOTG's latest auction making this one available. If interested please send me a PM or drop me an email.

$475 bucks delivered

Thanks all,
Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
